result.markdown: --- title: "Week 3: Time series decomposition" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Transforming data to remove some sources of variation * Decomposing a time series into trend-cycle, seasonal and remainder components * Seasonal adjustment ## Pre-class activities Read [Chapter 3 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/decomposition.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 1-5, 9-10 from [Section 3.7 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/decomposition-exercises.html). ## Monday lecture Download slides [Code used in lecture](lecture3.R) ## Tuesday workshop [Activities for Tuesday workshop](activities.qmd) ## Assignments * [Assignment 1](../assignments/A1.qmd) is due on Friday 28 March. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 3 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868355) is due on Sunday 23 March.
